text: Mary Jo Kopechne (; July 26, 1940 â€“ July 18, 1969) was an American teacher, secretary, and political campaign specialist. She died in a car accident at Chappaquiddick Island on July 18, 1969, while she was a passenger in a car being driven by U.S. Senator Ted Kennedy. She was born in Wilkes-Barre, Pennsylvania. ==References== ==Other websites== * FBI files on Mary Jo Kopechne and Chappaquiddick Category:1940 births Category:1969 deaths Category:People from Wilkes-Barre, Pennsylvania Category:American Roman Catholics Category:Educators from Pennsylvania Category:Deaths by drowning
title: Mary Jo Kopechne
